attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish to know why, Welsh people come from Wales. Scottish people come from Scotland and Irish people come from Ireland. So why is it us English people come from Britain. WE ARE ENGLISH AND VERY PROUD OF OUR HERITAGE. WHERE'S ST GEORGE WHEN WE NEED HIM. WE WANT TO FLY HIS FLAG WITH HONOUR BECAUSE WE ARE ENGLISH NOT BRITISH.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
